title: Athletism — Climbing (Elite) — Phase 2: Work Capacity & Antagonist Balance
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Weighted vest, sandbags, farmer carry handles
Rock shoes, approach shoes, helmet, rope (as needed)
goal: Increase repeatability and balance flexors/extensors for elbow/shoulder health.

warmup: Activation 8' (scap control, deep core, glute med)
Easy traverse or banded forearm prep 5'
main: Front Squat 5x5, Hip Thrust 4x8, Bench Pull 4x8
EMOM: sled push 20m / push‑ups 12 / MB slam 10
Extensor work: rubber band opens 3x25; wrist eccentrics 3x12

notes: Week 1: EMOM 20'. Week 2: EMOM 24' + easy vert gain hike.
